item.title: 2.4 🚀 Exciting new features and improvements
item.description:
🎉 v2.4 🚀 Exciting new features and improvements

We're excited to bring you version 2.4 of Jolly Dolphin 🐬 (Dreaming) with some amazing new features and improvements! 🎊


🤔 What's Changed? 🤓

  • 🧠 Taught our app that RAM isn't an all-you-can-eat buffet (fixed those pesky memory leaks that made your computer think it was training ChatGPT)
  • Fixed AirDrop invisible window issue and improved error handling 📱
  • Improved gesture sensitivity and controls 🖐️
  • Better memory management and performance optimizations ⚡
  • Enhanced UI responsiveness across virtual desktops 🖥️
  • Fixed various minor bugs and stability issues 🐛

item.title: 2.3 🚀 New release with bug fixes and great additions
item.description:
🎉 v2.3 🚀 New release with bug fixes and great additions

We're thrilled to announce the release of Glowing Panda version 2.3! 🎊 This major update brings numerous improvements and new features that will make your experience even more enjoyable.


🤔 What's Changed? 🤓

  • Fixed a bug that caused shelf to be unresponsive to drag and drop @Alexander 🛠️
  • Fixed a bug that caused sliding text to be unvisible 📝
  • Fixed a bug that re-enabled music live activity on media actions 🎵
  • Fixed a bug that caused the app flickering when Apple Intelligence windows were open @Alexander 🌟
  • Settings window won't open on start @Alexander 🛠️
  • New feature for battery that reflects low-power mode by @freepicheep 🔋
  • Preparing for custom animations in the live activity 🎉
  • Boring notch now stays centered around the notch when changing virtual desktops. 🌟
  • Keyboard shortcut I added to toggle the entire notch. @freepicheep 📝

item.title: 🎉 v2.2 🚀 New release with bug fixes and great additions
item.description:
🎉 v2.2 🚀 New release with bug fixes and great additions

We're thrilled to announce the release of Glowing Panda version 2.2! 🎊 This major update brings numerous improvements and new features that will make your experience even more enjoyable.


🤔 What's Changed? 🤓

  • Calendar & Behavior: 📅 Fixed calendar data handling and behavior issues (Thanks @LostCause!)
  • Music Features: 🎵 Added keyboard shortcut for music sneakPeek (Thanks @freepicheep!) and improved Mirror logic (Thanks @LostCause!)
  • App Management: 🔄 Implemented app restart functionality (Thanks @LostCause!)
  • Media Player: 🎬 New timeline slider and centered controls with tinting options (Based on @LostCause's work)
  • Live Activity: 📱 Added option to disable music live activity
  • UI Improvements: 🎨 Fixed sizing and spacing issues, especially notch content overlap
  • Gesture System: 🤚 Improved gesture logic (Thanks @LostCause!)
  • Header Update: 🔄 Removed "Glowing 🐼" text from header
  • Settings Enhancement: ⚙️ Added new Appearance and Shortcuts tabs

item.title: 🎉 v2.1 – Glowing Panda: The Update You've Been Waiting For (Sort Of) 😜
item.description:
🎉 v2.0 – Glowing Panda: The Update You've Been Waiting For (Sort Of) 😜

We're thrilled to announce the release of Glowing Panda version 2.0! 🎊 This major update brings numerous improvements and new features that will make your experience even more enjoyable.


🤔 What's New? 🤓

  • Rewritten Layout: The Speed Demon 🏃‍♂️ Our layout has been reworked for better performance, making it faster and smoother. We've also added some fancy animations to keep things interesting 😎
  • Polished Managers: The Playback Pro 🎵 Playback managers have been revamped to ensure a seamless experience. No more buffering or crashes – we've got this covered 💪
  • Calendar & Music Activity: The Visual Showstopper 📆 A fancy blur background behind music activity has been added to enhance the app's visual appeal. It's like a mini-movie in your app 🍿
  • Customization Options: Make it Yours (Sort Of) 🎨 More customization options have been introduced to personalize your glow. We've also added some new emojis to make things more fun 🤪
  • Improved Settings: Don't Lose Your Stuff 🗂️ New and improved settings that actually save changes 🔄. No more wondering where you put that pesky setting 🔍
  • Resource Management Optimizations: The Secret Sauce ⚙️ Our resource management has been optimized for a faster app. We've also added some secret sauce (just kidding, it's just good old-fashioned coding magic ✨)
  • Bug Fixes: 🚫 We've squashed some pesky bugs that caused issues with HUDs and Download Manager settings, shelf icon responsiveness, and General tab in Settings.
  • Update Check: 🔄 A new feature to check for updates in the Settings / About section has been added.
  • Non-Notch Display Customization: 🖥️ Customization options for non-notch displays have been introduced to ensure a seamless experience for all users.
  • GitHub Link Update: 🔄 The GitHub link in the settings has been updated to ensure easy access to the latest updates.
